thread.title: 5 power user tips to get the most out of your iPhone
thread.title_full: 5 power user tips to get the most out of your iPhone

author: Corey Protin
title: 5 power user tips to get the most out of your iPhone
text:
embed 
There are lots of useful iPhone features hidden deep in submenus — like the ability to stop auto-correct from saying "ducking," or just getting better quality calls. Here are some features that might be useful to you everyday if you're an iPhone user.
